Description: Responsibilities•Responsible for new vehicle introduction to fleet, ensuring that the right type and number of vehicles are introduced, and at the right time in order to fulfil customers’ requirements.•Prepare production orders and forward for management approval.•Receive vehicle order letters from salesmen and counter agents and verify if there are previous outstanding dues.•Scrutinize all letters in order to avoid multiple orders.•Create Inter office memo for new vehicle order as per the letter received and forward for management approval.•Verify the registration with delivery order regarding Colour, KT plate number, Chassis Number.•Make arrangements for new commercial vehicles for traffic passing.•Maintain excel sheet for Vehicle Order and file delivery order copies and Management approval copies of inter office copies.•Coordinate and follow up regarding the preparation of new vehicles and invoices.•Fully adhere to company's standard operating procedure (SOP).Skills
Skills: Field of Experience : Preferably in vehicle fleet
•Good communication skills, both written and verbal
Duty Shift / Timings : One Shift / 08:00 am to 05:00 pm
